tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biometric_geolocation_data (
    user_id INT,
    biometric_identifier VARCHAR(255),
    geolocation_data JSON,
    transaction_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT,
    PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
   transaction_id INT,
   user_id INT,
   amount DECIMAL,
   status VARCHAR,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_verification (
   verification_id INT,
   transaction_id INT,
   user_id INT,
   verification_result BOOLEAN,
   verification_time TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE geolocation_data (id INT, latitude FLOAT, longitude FLOAT, user_id INT)},{
CREATE TABLE biometric_identifiers (id INT, fingerprint_hash VARCHAR(255), facial_template BLOB, user_id INT)},{
CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (id INT, amount DECIMAL(10,2), date TIMESTAMP, user_id INT)},{
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (user_id INT, full_name VARCHAR(255), date_of_birth DATE, phone_number VARCHAR(20))},{
CREATE TABLE user_verifications (id INT, user_id INT, verification_date TIMESTAMP, verified BOOLEAN)
